column5: Merry Christmas y'all, and the very best to you in the coming year.  I'm off to Mexico for a little beach therapy shortly, but I'll have my laptop at hand (with a Modelo Negra in the other hand).  Thanks for a great 2008.  JF
Merry Christmas   have a good time in Mexico
A Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays to all.
Merry Christmas John!!!  Be careful down there in Mexico!!!... I've heard the have fish down there!
They definitely have fish. I've dived with 'em. And we make a pretty good dent in the Grouper and Shrimp population while we're there. They have lotsa great ways to prepare them.  Merry Christmas  JF
Hmmm, Mexico Beach Therapy!  Atlantic or Pacific?  Cancun has some great snorkelling near Cozumel and Isla Muheres.  Dos cervezas et dos towellas, por favor.
LAPTOP AT HAND..... WHAT.....John you need a fishing pole at all times, never mind them computer things  Have yourself and yours a very Merry Christmas and Happy New Years Leechman
Ya.  What was I  thinking.  Deep 6 the puter.
MERRY CHRISTMAS ALL!!!!!!!!! Have a safe holiday and HUG A BUNCH OF PEOPLE YOU LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!  From my Family to yours Peter
Merry Christmas,  May you find joy to fill your heart , food to fill your stomach and loved ones to hold.  Enjoy the Holidays  cheers  Jen

Cancun it is, south end of the Hotel Zone beach out towards the airport. When I feel the need of a little fishwatching I jump on a dive boat heading out near Isla Mujeres and commune with the pretty fishies for a few hours. When we wanna see bigger fishies we get on the bus to Coz. For the best diving though, the cenotes are pretty hard to beat.  This is the windy season in Cancun so deep sea fishing is an exercise in nausea control. Besides, I have yet to get caught up in the joys of longlining. I like chucking bait. There's a few hardcore types casting on the beach but generally they don't catch anything. I think there's better fishing in the mangroves at the south end of the lagoon (by the road from the airport) but I've never checked it out, and not just because I've seen the crocs prowling the lagoon. I'm not really sure I wanna share a shoreline with 'em but I may work up my courage this year.  JF

I generally don't pay it much attention, but this year I have a brand new office just opened and I want to keep tabs on what's happening there. I won't be on the computer much unless we get a rainy day.  JF
Thanks John...same to you!!!  Hope you have a great vacation!  Safe travels!
From my family to yours,,,all the best for the holidays and the coming year!!  :thumbsup_anim:
Merry Christmas everyone and and have a safe new year.  Peace
Ah ... nothing like a fresh Grouper Filet.  Had Grouper down in Key Wst a number of years ago - best fish I ever ate.    And yes, Merry Christmas John and hope the therapy works wonders.
